FX.name: Church
FX.description: This effect simulates the reverberations of a church.

Parameters.name: PreD
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the delay between input of the original sound and start of the reverb sound.

Parameters.name: Decay
Parameters.explanation: Sets the duration of the reverberations.

Parameters.name: Mix
Parameters.explanation: Adjusts the amount of effected sound that is mixed with the original sound.

Parameters.name: Tail
Parameters.explanation: When ON, effect sound continues even after effect is turned off. The dry sound also continues to have the same tone as when the effect was on. When OFF, effect sound stops right when effect is turned off.
